name: COP-E
description:
Play the web build here: https://cop-e.vercel.app/ (the build was a minute late and didnt make deadline :O).

Riots with mostly peaceful protesters have broken out in the city. Use your robot police squad to restore order and protect the police station at all costs. 

Click a robot to select an action. You can:

move: move your bot to a selected location
deploy : this will deploy tear gas and thwart protesters
restart: this will power down your bot and restore their peace of mind

If you run out of power, return to base to the glowing blue charger (get as close to the center as you can ... we might have goofed a collider o.O)

If you get defunded you just have to restart the game :\
